actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: Concurrent resolution calling for the conducting of a study by the Secretary of the Interior with respect to more efficient methods of use of coal and oil shale and the effect on American consumers of continued exports of coal.

summary.text: Calls for a study by the Secretary of the Interior to investigate more efficient methods of use of coal and oil shale and the effect on American consumers of continued exports of coal.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution calling for the conducting of a study by the Secretary of the Interior with respect to more efficient methods of use of coal and oil shale and the effect on American consumers of continued exports of coal.
